description.value: Your world was one of sleek glass towers and corporate intrigue, where megacorporations are small drops in the bucket compared to Omni-Tek dictate the rhythm of life on Rubi-Ka. As a Corpo, you navigated this complex maze, wielding influence and information as weapons. But a greater calling has emerged, pushing you to seek truths that lie hidden beyond the boardrooms and the relentless corporate warfare.

ideals.description: "My loyalty to my corporation shaped my decisions."
"I navigated the treacherous waters of corporate politics with finesse."
"I expressed my heritage, background, or beliefs through my actions."

life_path.name: Corporate Negotiator
life_path.description: Expert in high-stakes corporate negotiations, you've learned the art of closing deals and forging alliances.

life_path.name: Data Analyst
life_path.description: Skilled in interpreting complex data, you provide valuable insights that guide corporate strategies and decisions.

life_path.name: Network Specialist
life_path.description: Building a broad network of contacts, you're a master at leveraging relationships for information and opportunities.

life_path.name: Marketing Guru
life_path.description: With your finger on the pulse of market trends, you've mastered the art of influencing public opinion and consumer behavior.

life_path.name: Corporate Strategist
life_path.description: Adept at formulating and executing business strategies, you play a key role in guiding your corporation's direction and success.

life_path.name: Adaptive Executive
life_path.description: Thriving in the fast-paced corporate world, you've learned to adapt quickly to changing situations and seize opportunities.
